Advanced Safety Technology

Multiple Detection Methods

Five different ways to detect emergencies and trigger instant response. Because every situation is different, and every life matters.

Detection Method 1

Manual SOS Button

Instant emergency activation with a single press. Immediately alerts emergency services, hospitals, and family members with your exact location.

Detection Method 2

Voice Command System

Say 'Help Help Help' to activate emergency response when physical interaction isn't possible. Advanced voice recognition works even in noisy environments.

Detection Method 3

Automatic Airbag Sensor

Automatically detects airbag deployment and triggers emergency protocols instantly. No manual intervention required during critical moments.

Detection Method 4

Impact Detection System

Four-corner impact sensors detect crashes from any angle. Advanced algorithms distinguish between accidents and normal driving conditions.

Detection Method 5

Water Submersion Alert

Specialized water sensors detect vehicle submersion and activate drowning emergency protocols. Critical for water-related accidents.

Proven Emergency Response Process

How InfiCare Saves Lives

From detection to rescue in under 60 seconds. Our automated process ensures help reaches you faster than ever before.

Detection
